resources.string: A new version of Samsung Cloud is available. You can update it after your data is restored.
"A request to access to Samsung Cloud was denied because we couldn't verify that it was you."
Add OneDrive to Gallery and My Files to get all this:
Add your email address to your Samsung account so we can send you the verification email.
After the move, Gallery will be continuously backed up to OneDrive.
After you agree to all of the above, this message will not be shown again.
After your accounts are connected, your pictures and videos will automatically start syncing to OneDrive.
All your data has been restored to your phone. Your SD card data is in the %s folder.
All your data has been restored to your phone.
All your data has been restored to your phone. Your SD card data is in the %s folder.
All your data has been restored to your tablet. Your SD card data is in the %s folder.
All your data has been restored to your tablet.
All your data has been restored to your tablet. Your SD card data is in the %s folder.
Allow All files access for Samsung Cloud
Allow All files access for Samsung Cloud
Allow %s to use network connections and access the following data:
Allow the use of network connections for %s to access the following features:
Allow this app to read, modify, and delete all files on this phone and any connected storage.
Allow this app to read, modify, and delete all files on this tablet and any connected storage.
Any device signed in to your account can restore Secure Folder.
Apps set to back up automatically. App backup required to back up Home screen.
Apps set to restore automatically. App restoration required to restore Home screen.
AR Emoji: emojis and custom-designed items
Are you accessing Samsung Cloud on another device?
Ask us to unlock Samsung Cloud
Ask us to unlock Samsung account storage
For security, access to Enhanced data protection settings is blocked because an incorrect recovery code was entered too many times.
Auto back up app data daily
Auto back up will also be turned off.
Automatically back up data from Phone, Messages, Settings, and more when the screen is off, but your phone is connected to Wi-Fi and a power source.
Automatically back up data from Phone, Messages, Settings, and more when the screen is off, but your tablet is connected to Wi-Fi and a power source.
Back up your photos and videos from Gallery to OneDrive to keep them synced on all your devices.
Backups and synced data not encrypted
"Encrypt backup data was turned off from another device. If this wasn't you, change your Samsung account password right away."
"Your Samsung Cloud backup data was encrypted from another device. If this wasn't you, change your Samsung account password right away."
For security, previous unencrypted backups of this phone will be deleted from %s.
For security, your old unencrypted backup of this tablet will be deleted from %s.
Your next backup will be encrypted
%1$s can now be backed up in encrypted format. For security, old unencrypted backups of this data will be deleted from %2$s.
New data will be encrypted next backup
Replace your old backup data with new data from your phone.
Replace your old backup data with new data from your tablet.
Your previous backup will be deleted. The new backup will still expire and be deleted on %s.
"The following backups will be deleted because they're not encrypted. They'll be replaced by encrypted versions the next time you back up."
"The following backups will be deleted because they're encrypted. They'll be replaced by unencrypted versions the next time you back up."
Battery is too low. Charge it to at least %d%% and try again.
"Be sure to resolve this issue before %s. After that date, you'll no longer be able to move your data to OneDrive, and any data still in Samsung Cloud will be deleted."
Bluetooth: paired Galaxy Home speakers and Galaxy Buds
Bring your data from Samsung Cloud
Browse your pictures and videos by date, tags, and curated albums.
By continuing, you agree to the %1$sTerms and Conditions%2$s and %3$sPrivacy Notice%4$s.
By continuing, you agree to let Microsoft OneDrive and %s collaborate to manage Gallery content.
By continuing, you agree to the %1$sCross-border Data Transfer Policy%2$s.
"Can't back up data while restoring or deleting data."
"Can't back up data because another backup is being created or restored."
To continue backing up data to Samsung Cloud, you need to enter your recovery code for enhanced data protection. Tap to enter it now.
"Can't create backup because another one of your devices is currently being backed up."
"Can't delete data while backing up or restoring data."
"Can't move your data because the %s folder is in the Recycle Bin in OneDrive. Go to OneDrive to restore the folder."
"Can't restore app. This app isn't supported on this phone."
"Can't restore app. This app isn't supported on this tablet."
"Can't restore app. This app's data can't be used on this phone."
"Can't restore app. This app's data can't be used on this tablet."
"Can't restore data because another backup is being created or restored."
To continue restoring your data, you need to enter your recovery code for Enhanced data protection. Tap to enter it now.
"Can't restore data. No backup data found."
"Can't restore data while backing up or deleting data."
"Can't restore data while creating a backup."
"Can't sync because your phone is too hot. Try again when it cools down."
"Can't sync because your tablet is too hot. Try again when it cools down."
"Can't sync now because you're roaming and Sync while roaming is off."
"Can't sync while connected to a mobile hotspot."
"Can't sync while roaming. Sync and back up while roaming is turned off in Samsung Cloud settings."
"Can't sync your data because the folder synced with Samsung Gallery is in the Recycle Bin in OneDrive. To resume syncing, restore this folder from the Recycle Bin."
"Can't sync your data because the %s folder is in the Recycle Bin in OneDrive. To resume syncing, take this folder out of the Recycle Bin."
"Can't view this backup while restoring or deleting another backup."
"There's no data in this category on your phone, so all the data from your old backup will be deleted."
Check our %1$sPrivacy Policy%2$s to see how we manage your data.
"Check that the phone or tablet you're using for verification is turned on and has a network connection so it can receive notifications."
Check that your email address is correct. If it is, check your spam folder.
Check the notification that was sent.
Check the verification email that was sent to %s.
Check your network connection and try again.
Choose a backup to restore data from.
Choose the device and data you want to restore.
"Confirm whether it's you trying to access your Samsung Cloud data."
Connect to a Wi-Fi network or turn on Data roaming.
Connect to a Wi-Fi network or turn on Mobile data.
Connect to a Wi-Fi or mobile network and try again.
Connect to a Wi-Fi network, then try again.
Connect to Wi-Fi to back up your data.
Connect to Wi-Fi to restore your data.
Contacts (Samsung account): contacts, email addresses, and business cards
"Couldn't connect to OneDrive. Try again later."
"Couldn't connect to Samsung Cloud. Try again later."
"Couldn't connect to Samsung Cloud. Check your network connection and try again."
"Couldn't sync because your battery was too low. Charge to at least %d%% to sync."
"Couldn't sync because you were connected to a mobile hotspot."
"Couldn't sync because you were using mobile data. You can change this in settings."
"Couldn't sync because you're roaming. You can change this in settings."
There was a problem syncing automatically. You can try syncing now to see if the issue is resolved.
"Couldn't back up 1 file larger than %d GB."
"Couldn't back up %1$d files larger than %2$d GB."
"Couldn't back up %1$d files larger than %2$s GB"
"Couldn't back up this data. Clear some space in Samsung Cloud and try again."
"Couldn't back up this data. Connect to Wi-Fi and try again."
"Couldn't back up this data. Check your network connection and try again."
"Couldn't connect to OneDrive. Try again later."
Create albums in Gallery to keep all your best shots together.
Creating a new backup will stop all restorations of your previous backup.

Data from your apps will be synced with Galaxy Cloud if:

"Can't sync because this phone doesn't support data encryption."
"Can't sync because this tablet doesn't support data encryption."
Data will be transferred in the background when your phone is connected to a mobile network or WLAN.
"Decrypting your data makes it less secure, but you'll be able to access it from devices that don't support end-to-end encryption."
This will stop this backup from being restored to any other devices.

Deleting these items will free up %1$s %2$s of space on your tablet.

"Contact %1$sCustomer Service%2$s for more information.
Error code: %3$s"
To complete this purchase, you need to enable the Galaxy Store in Settings.
To complete this purchase, you need to update the Galaxy Store.
Contact Customer Service to complete your purchase.
To open %s, enable the app in Settings.
Enable %s in Settings to upgrade your Microsoft cloud plan.
"Couldn't restore some data because Knox Matrix didn't respond."
If this problem continues, contact us through Samsung Members for support.
"Couldn't back up some data because Knox Matrix didn't respond."
If this problem continues, contact us through Samsung Members for support.
Encrypt backup data was turned off.
"Your backup was canceled because Encrypt backup data was turned off. The backup needs to be restarted to ensure it's uploaded without encryption."
Your restoration was canceled because Encrypt backup data was turned off. You can restart the restoration without encryption now.
Encrypt backup data was turned on.
Your backup was canceled because Encrypt backup data was turned on. The backup needs to be restarted to ensure end-to-end encryption.
Your restoration was canceled because Encrypt backup data was turned on. You can restart the restoration with end-to-end encryption now.
"Your %s data is encrypted with a technology that this phone doesn't support. You can no longer sync this data on this device."
"Your %s data is encrypted with a technology that this tablet doesn't support. You can no longer sync this data on this device."
Encrypted data will only sync with devices that support end-to-end encryption.
"Tap the button below to erase your %s data. Some data may not be erased if a law requires us to retain it. If retention is required, we'll erase it as soon as the retention period ends."
To erase your personal data, go to the Samsung Privacy website, then click My data > Deletion.
"Everything else you're currently backing up to Samsung Cloud will continue to be backed up there, with no storage limit."
"Everything's safe and sound in Samsung Cloud."
"Files and app data larger than %d GB can't be backed up."
"Files larger than %s GB can't be backed up to Samsung Cloud."
"Files larger than %s GB can't be backed up to Samsung account storage."
Clock: alarms, world clocks, and timers
Home screen: layout, wallpapers, and Samsung DeX settings
Messages: enhanced messages, multimedia messages, and text messages
Settings: accessibility settings, ringtones, Samsung Keyboard options, Wi-Fi settings, paired Bluetooth devices, and Always On Display settings (default ringtone not encrypted)
"Find out what data can't be backed up"
For details on how Samsung handles your personal data, please read our %5$sprivacy policy%6$s.
For security, Secure Folder is encrypted when you back it up to %s. Choose how to secure it.
"Gallery items on your SD card can't be synced with Samsung Cloud. Move these items to internal storage to sync them."
Go to %1$sSamsung account storage%2$s to choose what data to sync.
Go to %1$sSamsung Cloud > Back up data%2$s to choose what data to back up.
Go to %1$sSamsung Cloud%2$s to choose what data to sync.
Go to Settings > Apps > %s > Permissions after setup to allow this permission.
To upgrade your plan, you need to sign in to your Google account.
Samsung Health: health data such as exercise and sleep data, body composition records, and more
Home screen backups will also be deleted.

I agree to all of the above and agree to use the Samsung Account Storage service provided in collaboration with Microsoft OneDrive service.

Keep your data safe and synced on all your devices using Samsung Cloud.

Keep your stuff safe and synced on all your devices using Samsung Cloud.

To sync, back up, and recover data from %s, you need to download your encryption key from one of your other devices. The other device needs to be connected to a network for you to download the key from it.

"We're restoring your Home screen and settings now, then we'll restore the rest of your data after setup."

"This tablet doesn't have One UI 5.1.1 or later, so it can't access your encrypted cloud data. Enter your recovery code to turn off encryption so you can access your cloud data."

"Once it's updated, it will be restored to your tablet."

"To back up your data, you need to clear at least %s of space on your tablet. This space will be used to compress your data before it's backed up."

To download backup, you need to connect to Wi-Fi.

"To handle your personal data request, we've locked your Samsung account storage and turned off Sync and Auto back up."

To restore your tablet, you need to connect to a Wi-Fi network.

To restore this data, allow the %s permission.

To sync Gallery images and videos, you need to allow the %s permission in Settings.
To sync Gallery with OneDrive, change the %s permission for Samsung Cloud to Allow all.
To sync or back up data, you need to allow the %s permission in Settings.

To sync this data, allow the %s permissions.

To turn on Maintenance mode, you need to stop restoring your backup data.
To turn on Maintenance mode, you need to stop your ongoing backup.

To unpin this app, touch and hold the Recents and Back buttons at the same time.
To use this feature, you need to allow permission in Settings.

"Transferring Gallery and My files data from Samsung account storage to Microsoft OneDrive. This data isn't available to download or share while transferring."

We noticed suspicious activity in your account, so we locked Samsung account storage to protect your data. To unlock Samsung account storage, contact us at the following website:
"We paused the transfer to do a bit of maintenance on our system. Sorry for the delay, but we'll get back to transferring your stuff soon."
"We've run into a problem. Try again later."

Wi-Fi connection required. Connect to Wi-Fi and try again.

You can use Samsung Cloud on this tablet from now on.
